column4: A collection of dichotomous probabilistic events (i.e., they either happen or they don't)
A collection of categorization schemes for precipitation type

This categorization method was introduced ~2000 to encode short-range GFS MOS bulletins (MEX). It combines sleet with freezing rain and freezing drizzle into a freezing category and uses a seperate category to encode a mixture of rain and snow.

This categorization method was introduced ~2005 to encode short-range GFS MOS bulletins (MAV). It combines sleet with freezing rain and freezing drizzle into a freezing category and includes a mixture of rain and snow in the liquid category.
